thread.title: Governor signs bill to automatically register voters at DMV
thread.title_full: Governor signs bill to automatically register voters at DMV - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Hamed Aleaziz
title: Governor signs bill to automatically register voters at DMV
text:
Photo: Michael Macor, The Chronicle A display is set up in United Nations Plaza urging people to register to vote, as seen on Tuesday Sept. 23, 2014, in San Francisco, Calif. The San Francisco Department of Elections holds a voter registration drive at UN Plaza during today's National Voter Registration Day. A display is set up in United Nations Plaza urging people to...
All eligible Californians will be automatically registered to vote when they get new or renewed driver’s licenses under legislation signed Saturday by Gov. Jerry Brown. A display is set up in United Nations Plaza urging people to register to vote, as seen on Tuesday Sept. 23, 2014, in San Francisco, Calif. The San Francisco Department of Elections holds a voter registration drive at UN Plaza during today's National Voter Registration Day. A display is set up in United Nations Plaza urging people to...
All eligible Californians will be automatically registered to vote when they get new or renewed driver’s licenses under legislation signed Saturday by Gov. Jerry Brown.
